net.corda.core.crypto

Class SecureHash.Companion

  • net.corda.core.crypto.SecureHash.Companion
  • Enclosing class:
    SecureHash

    public static class SecureHash.Companion

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SecureHash allOnesHashFor(java.lang.String algorithm) 
      SecureHash componentHashAs(java.lang.String algorithm, byte[] bytes)
      Computes the digest of the ByteArray which is resistant to pre-image attacks. It computes the hash of the hash for SHA2-256 and other algorithms loaded via JCA MessageDigest. For custom algorithms the strategy can be modified via interface DigestAlgorithm.
      SecureHash create(java.lang.String str)
      Converts a SecureHash hash value represented as a {algorithm:}hexadecimal String into a class SecureHash.
      int digestLengthFor(java.lang.String algorithm) 
      SecureHash.SHA256 getAllOnesHash()
      A SHA-256 hash value consisting of 32 0xFF bytes. This field provides more intuitive access from Java.
      SecureHash.SHA256 getAllOnesHash()
      A SHA-256 hash value consisting of 32 0xFF bytes. This function is provided for API stability.
      SecureHash.SHA256 getZeroHash()
      A SHA-256 hash value consisting of 32 0x00 bytes. This field provides more intuitive access from Java.
      SecureHash.SHA256 getZeroHash()
      A SHA-256 hash value consisting of 32 0x00 bytes. This function is provided for API stability.

      Computes the hash value of the ByteArray.
      SecureHash nonceHashAs(java.lang.String algorithm, byte[] bytes)
      Computes the digest of the ByteArray which is resistant to pre-image attacks. It computes the hash of the hash for SHA2-256 and other algorithms loaded via JCA MessageDigest. For custom algorithms the strategy can be modified via interface DigestAlgorithm.

      Converts a SHA-256 hash value represented as a hexadecimal String into a class SecureHash.

      Generates a random hash value.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public SecureHash create(java.lang.String str)

        Converts a SecureHash hash value represented as a {algorithm:}hexadecimal String into a class SecureHash.

        Parameters:
        str - An optional algorithm id followed by a delimiter and the sequence of hexadecimal digits that represents a hash value.
        Throws:
        - The input string does not contain the expected number of hexadecimal digits, or it contains incorrectly-encoded characters.
        See Also:
        String, class SecureHash

      • parse

        public SecureHash.SHA256 parse(java.lang.String str)

        Converts a SHA-256 hash value represented as a hexadecimal String into a class SecureHash.

        Parameters:
        str - A sequence of 64 hexadecimal digits that represents a SHA-256 hash value.
        Throws:
        - The input string does not contain 64 hexadecimal digits, or it contains incorrectly-encoded characters.
        See Also:
        String, class SecureHash

      • digestLengthFor

        public int digestLengthFor(java.lang.String algorithm)
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The MessageDigest algorithm to query.
        Returns:
        The length in bytes of this MessageDigest.

      • hashAs

        public SecureHash hashAs(java.lang.String algorithm,
                         byte[] bytes)

        Computes the hash value of the ByteArray.

        Parameters:
        algorithm - Java provider name of the digest algorithm.
        bytes - The ByteArray to hash.
        See Also:
        ByteArray

      • componentHashAs

        public SecureHash componentHashAs(java.lang.String algorithm,
                                  byte[] bytes)

        Computes the digest of the ByteArray which is resistant to pre-image attacks. It computes the hash of the hash for SHA2-256 and other algorithms loaded via JCA MessageDigest. For custom algorithms the strategy can be modified via interface DigestAlgorithm.

        Parameters:
        algorithm - The MessageDigest algorithm to use.
        bytes - The ByteArray to hash.
        See Also:
        ByteArray, MessageDigest, interface DigestAlgorithm

      • nonceHashAs

        public SecureHash nonceHashAs(java.lang.String algorithm,
                              byte[] bytes)

        Computes the digest of the ByteArray which is resistant to pre-image attacks. It computes the hash of the hash for SHA2-256 and other algorithms loaded via JCA MessageDigest. For custom algorithms the strategy can be modified via interface DigestAlgorithm.

        Parameters:
        algorithm - The MessageDigest algorithm to use.
        bytes - The ByteArray to hash.
        See Also:
        ByteArray, MessageDigest, interface DigestAlgorithm

      • sha256

        public SecureHash.SHA256 sha256(byte[] bytes)

        Computes the SHA-256 hash value of the ByteArray.

        Parameters:
        bytes - The ByteArray to hash.
        See Also:
        ByteArray

      • sha256Twice

        public SecureHash.SHA256 sha256Twice(byte[] bytes)

        Computes the SHA-256 hash of the ByteArray, and then computes the SHA-256 hash of the hash.

        Parameters:
        bytes - The ByteArray to hash.
        See Also:
        ByteArray

      • sha256

        public NonExistentClass sha256(java.lang.String str)

        Computes the SHA-256 hash of the String's UTF-8 byte contents.

        Parameters:
        str - String whose UTF-8 contents will be hashed.
        See Also:
        String

      • randomSHA256

        public SecureHash.SHA256 randomSHA256()

        Generates a random SHA-256 value.

        public SecureHash random(java.lang.String algorithm)

      • getZeroHash

        public SecureHash.SHA256 getZeroHash()

        A SHA-256 hash value consisting of 32 0x00 bytes. This field provides more intuitive access from Java.
